amendment.description: Amendment requires campaign committees to transfer suspected illegal or improper campaign contributions to the Federal Election Commission for evaluation and investigation before the funds may be returned to the donor.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require political committees to transfer suspected illegal or improper campaign contributions of over $500 to the Federal Election Commission for evaluation and investigation.

action.text: Amendment (A043) offered by Mr. Gekas to the Shays amendment (A002).
